DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study provide weight loss intervention Mothers participate WIC program , use internet deliver weight loss material .
DOC.brief_title: Fit Moms- Internet-based Postpartum Weight Loss Program
DOC.detailed_description: Develop recruitment method determine feasibility recruit WIC postpartum woman meet inclusion criterion . We collect data number individual screen reason exclusion . Establish examine feasibility effectiveness protocol WIC counselor reinforce adherence web base program . We assess frequency WIC counselor adhere protocol reinforce adherence web-based program extent `` treatment contamination '' occur WIC counselor Standard Care participants.In randomize Enhanced WIC + Internet-based postpartum program , examine acceptability , burden , ease use , frequency technical problem , adherence web-based program ( number logins , message board posting ) Explore whether Enhanced WIC plus Internet postpartum weight loss program produce significantly great weight loss Standard WIC 2 month . Explore whether Enhanced WIC plus Internet postpartum weight loss program result great improvement eat exercise behavior ( examine 0 , 2 month ) psychosocial parameter ( i.e. , depression , social support , self-efficacy , body image ) standard care .
DOC.criteria: Age 1835 year . Delivery within 652 week Exceed prepregnancy weight least 6.8 kg ( 15 pound ) Current BMI > 22 English speaking Has computer internet access Literacy least 5th grade read level Pregnant planning become pregnant Relocating next year Serious medical problem ( i.e . heart disease , cancer , renal disease diabetes ) , physician supervision diet exercise prescription need .
DOC.keyword: Internet base weight loss intervention Mothers WIC program .
